mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CC_CODE) FROM COMPANYCRAWLING WHERE CC_ADDR1 LIKE '%${src_a1}%' AND CC_ADDR2 LIKE '%${src_a2}%' AND CC_CAREER LIKE '%${src_cer}%' AND CC_EDUCATION LIKE '%${src_edu}%' AND (CC_META LIKE '%${src_key}%' OR CC_TITLE LIKE '%${src_key}%' OR CC_NAME LIKE '%${src_key}%')

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, COMPANYCRAWLING.* FROM COMPANYCRAWLING WHERE CC_ADDR1 LIKE '%${companyCrawlingSearchDto.src_a1}%' AND CC_ADDR2 LIKE '%${companyCrawlingSearchDto.src_a2}%' AND CC_CAREER LIKE '%${companyCrawlingSearchDto.src_cer}%' AND CC_EDUCATION LIKE '%${companyCrawlingSearchDto.src_edu}%' AND (CC_META LIKE '%${companyCrawlingSearchDto.src_key}%' OR CC_TITLE LIKE '%${companyCrawlingSearchDto.src_key}%' OR CC_NAME LIKE '%${companyCrawlingSearchDto.src_key}%')) RN WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
